text: HKT may refer to: * German Eastern Marches Society, known as Hakata or H-K-T, a German nationalist organization active 1894–1934 * Helsingin Kisa-Toverit, a Finnish sport club * Hong Kong Telecom, a telecom company in Hong Kong * Hong Kong Tramways, a tram system in Hong Kong * Hong Kong Time, the time zone in Hong Kong * Höckmayr KFZ-Technik, a German manufacturer of Lotus 7 clones * Phuket International Airport, in Thailand * Higher-kinded type, a construct in some programming languages
title: HKT
